website_summaries.verdict: An adorable puppy inflatable that is just the right size to add to your holiday decor. However, if you prefer illumination, it may disappoint you.
pros: The perfect inflatable for dog lovers, thanks to the cute puppy design that's ready for the holiday with a Santa hat
3 foot 6 inch size is practical for most yards, and is easy to put in place
Owners rave about the sturdy material and cute design
cons: Checking the package upon delivery is recommended, as a customer complained about receiving a partial power cord

customer_reviews.title: Playful
customer_reviews.text: The cat and dog love their Christmas tree and can’t wait to open their gifts...LOL!! This set is bringing all the neighborhood kids to our yard. Very easy to put up and just as easy to roll back down and put away for next year. I wish they were a little brighter at night but adorable nonetheless :)
customer_reviews.author: @lowcarbdelights

customer_reviews.title: Great and Easy Decorations to set-up.
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for a joke that I played on some neighbors. It was so easy to set up and take down. I set it up on an outside timers so it turned on and off without my need to go outside in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to pull this thing out of storage. It is absolutely adorable, good size, ans blows up quickly. Last year we made it look like the dog was pulling lights off the house and it was fantastic. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Puff the Magic Dog!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price, on-time delivery. Easy setup and cute to add to other displays.
customer_reviews.author: RoninSATX

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but...
customer_reviews.text: This dog is a good looking figure but it only has one light in the front section, so when looking from the back it's not so easily visible....
customer_reviews.author: GlevumGuy.

customer_reviews.title: Three years strong
customer_reviews.text: This thing has held up really good for the past three years
customer_reviews.author: frank de armas

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Had this in the front yard from the beginning of the month of December until the first of January and it was just the right height and size. Had so many compliments and all the dogs that walk bye would stop and give a couple barks and move on. It was quite humorous and cute. Would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Stauffacher

customer_reviews.title: Good boy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my holiday decor in the front yard
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste!
customer_reviews.text: Light lasted one day and first windy day it tore open, and yes it was tied down properly
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: the puppy's face and hat are lit up well at night, but the body is not as brigtly lit. It takes about one minute to set up, and it's very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Nahla A.

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but the light in it is not real bright so it's hard to see at night.
customer_reviews.author: c roll

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My pet always does this because she wants to play like this. This is the reason for my purchase. It would be better if it was bigger in size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small for outdoor decoration
customer_reviews.text: Its a outdoor decoration and cute but a little to small.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent w .Krzykowski III

customer_reviews.title: Look for better products
customer_reviews.text: Does not light up well. Hard to see at night
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hanna Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light wasn't very bright! By the second year you can see it light up at all
customer_reviews.author: Kelley DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Cute design but a little smaller than I thought it would be. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Packaging, display on box what this was !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy with this. Had no information, no picture on box. Didn't even know what this was .
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

product_meta.title: Airblown Inflatable Playful Puppy Dog wIth Santa Hat by Gemmy
product_meta.description: Dimensions: 2.5"H X 3.5"W. Internally LED Lighted For Nighttime Display. Comes With Built in Fan Motor, Yard Stakes & Tether Ropes. Self Inflates!! Just Plug Into 110 Outlet. Made By Gemmy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
